params.fixedPriceSaleAddressConfig: The address configuration for the fixed price sale.
params.fixedPriceSalePeriodAndFeeConfig: The period and fee configuration for the fixed price sale.

returns.fixedPriceSaleInstance: The address of the fixedPriceSaleInstance deployed.

params.preLiquidSaleConfig: The configuration for the pre-liquid sale.

returns.preLiquidSaleInstance: The address of the preLiquidSaleInstance deployed.

params.sealedBidAuctionAddressConfig: The address configuration for the sealed bid auction.
params.sealedBidAuctionPeriodAndFeeConfig: The period and fee configuration for the sealed bid auction.

returns.sealedBidAuctionInstance: The address of the sealedBidAuctionInstance deployed.
